\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\dF\cR^{*}.\cR\dH} &&&& \dH \\
	\\
	&& {\dG\cR^{*}.\cR\dH} \\
	\dF &&&& \dX \\
	\\
	&& \dG
	\arrow["\cR"', from=6-3, to=4-5]
	\arrow["{\cR^{*}}", from=1-5, to=4-5]
	\arrow["\lambda"', from=4-1, to=6-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "\cR"{pos=0.6}, from=4-1, to=4-5]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=6-3]
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=4-1]
	\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, from=1-1, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\cR^{*}\lambda}"', color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, dashed, from=1-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\lambda^{\#}}", curve={height=-12pt}, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, from=6-3, to=0]
	\arrow["{\cR^{*}\lambda^{\#}}", color={rgb,255:red,214;green,92;blue,92}, curve={height=-12pt}, shorten >=4pt, Rightarrow, dashed, from=3-3, to=1]
\end{tikzcd}\]
